sentence: He was tired. He continued working.
answer: Although he was tired, he continued working.|He continued working although he was tired.
translation: Bien qu'il fût fatigué, il a continué à travailler.

sentence: She stayed home. She was sick.
answer: She stayed home because she was sick.|Because she was sick, she stayed home.
translation: Elle est restée à la maison parce qu'elle était malade.

sentence: You study hard. You will pass.
answer: If you study hard, you will pass.|You will pass if you study hard.
translation: Si tu étudies dur, tu réussiras.

sentence: I like tea. I don't like coffee.
answer: I like tea but I don't like coffee.|I like tea, but I don't like coffee.
translation: J'aime le thé mais je n'aime pas le café.

sentence: It was raining. We took an umbrella.
answer: It was raining so we took an umbrella.|It was raining, so we took an umbrella.
translation: Il pleuvait donc nous avons pris un parapluie.
